https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/m61BsYlxAZYzn4ueCCGPLAz1Ue2.jpg Just out of jail, Fai finds a spot on a street corner where other homeless people welcome him. But he doesn’t get much time to settle in. The police soon chase them away, and their possessions disappear into a garbage truck. Young social worker Ms Ho thinks it’s time to fight this in court. In the meantime, Fai and his friends have other concerns. Drifting
